author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hansen Technologies Says ‍HY NPAT Attributable Up 33.4% To $18 Million​
text:
Feb 23 (Reuters) - Hansen Technologies Ltd:‍
* HY REVENUES FROM ORDINARY ACTIVITIES UP 36.3 PERCENT TO $118.4 MILLION
* ‍HY NET PROFIT AFTER TAX ATTRIBUTABLE UP 33.4% TO $18 MILLION​
* 2018 ‍INTERIM DIVIDEND 3 CENTS PER SHARE​ * OPERATING REVENUE IN 2H18 IS EXPECTED TO BE SLIGHTLY BELOW 1H18​
* EBITDA MARGIN FOR FULL FY18 IS ANTICIPATED TO BE AROUND MID-POINT OF TARGET RANGE OF 25%-30%
* ‍EBITDA MARGIN FOR 2H18 IS ANTICIPATED TO BE WITHIN TARGET RANGE OF 25%-30%​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
